snippet: A man who robbed a bank the same day he was released from prison for robbing banks was reunited with the federal judge who sentenced him for robbery the first time.
abstract: Victor Larsen, who robbed a Capital One bank in Sunnyside, Queens the same day he was released from prison for bank robbery, and four more banks in the days that followed, is sentenced to 84 months in prison.
lead_paragraph: A man who robbed a bank the same day he was released from prison for robbing banks was reunited with the federal judge who sentenced him for robbery the first time.

headline.seo: Judge Meets Repeat Robber; Both Are Contrite
headline.main: Judge and Repeat Robber Meet Again
headline.print_headline: Judge Tells Repeat Robber To Get Help
